-from abc import ABC, abstractmethod%0Aimport math%0A%0Aclass Shape(ABC):%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def getArea(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def getPerimeter(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def getName(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A%0Aclass Point2D:%0A    def __init__(self, x: float, y: float):%0A        self.x = x%0A        self.y = y%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22(%7Bself.x:.2f%7D, %7Bself.y:.2f%7D)%22%0A%0A%0Aclass Circle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, center: Point2D, radius: float):%0A        self.name = %22Circ%22%0A        self.center = center%0A        self.radius = radius%0A%0A    def getName(self):%0A        return self.name%0A%0A    def getArea(self):%0A        return math.pi * self.radius ** 2%0A%0A    def getPerimeter(self):%0A        return 2 * math.pi * self.radius%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22Circ: C=%7Bself.center%7D, R=%7Bself.radius:.2f%7D%22%0A%0A%0Aclass Rectangle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, p1: Point2D, p2: Point2D):%0A        self.name = %22Rect%22%0A        self.p1 = p1%0A        self.p2 = p2%0A%0A    def getName(self):%0A        return self.name
+class

@@ -1036,1095 +1036,4 @@
 name
-%0A%0A    def getArea(self):%0A        largura = abs(self.p1.x - self.p2.x)%0A        altura = abs(self.p1.y - self.p2.y)%0A        return largura * altura%0A%0A    def getPerimeter(self):%0A        largura = abs(self.p1.x - self.p2.x)%0A        altura = abs(self.p1.y - self.p2.y)%0A        return 2 * (largura + altura)%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22Rect: P1=%7Bself.p1%7D P2=%7Bself.p2%7D%22%0A%0Adef main():%0A    shapes = %5B%5D%0A    while True:%0A        line = input().strip()%0A        args = line.split()%0A        print(%22$%22 + %22 %22.join(args))%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22circle%22:%0A            x, y, r = map(float, args%5B1:%5D)%0A            shapes.append(Circle(Point2D(x, y), r))%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22rect%22:%0A            x1, y1, x2, y2 = map(float, args%5B1:%5D)%0A            shapes.append(Rectangle(Point2D(x1, y1), Point2D(x2, y2)))%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A            for s in shapes:%0A                print(s)%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22info%22:%0A            for s in shapes:%0A                print(f%22%7Bs.getName()%7D: A=%7Bs.getArea():.2f%7D P=%7Bs.getPerimeter():.2f%7D%22)%0A%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A            break%0A%0A%0Amain()
